data.text: @DrGoodknight Well is always a relative term, but today was better than others and I got some things accomplished. Looking forward to hearing how it goes!
@DrGoodknight Start easy and build up. I hope it helps!
@DrGoodknight Enjoy.  It can be really fun.
@DrGoodknight Please let us know if it helps with depression. Wondering if I need to start this as well.
@larasandusky I think it helps. I don't really go out so the convenience is great. The tracked workouts is a nice feature
@DrGoodknight need to do that so bad
@DrGoodknight Do you like it?   I need to do something since my running has all but stopped during the winter.   Argh!
@ColtsGal76 @PelotonMed Thanks. Looking forward to cardiopulmonary rehab with a good community
